genre_description: A fairy tale sequel that blends high fantasy with steampunk-inspired AI elements, exploring themes of overprotection, discovery, and reconciliation.

ai_characters.name: Evangeline
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system integrated into the Windward Kingdom's flagship and infrastructure, serving as a chronicler, strategist, and companion.

behaviors.description: Chronicles historical events and environmental conditions to maintain an objective record of truth.
behaviors.quote: Recording begins... Windward Royal Flagship, main deck. Calm seas, scattered lanterns, whale-song in minor key. Parents present: Ariel Marina and Prince Eric Windward. Subject: newborn Melody Windward, alive and radiantly tiny.

behaviors.description: Issues proactive safety protocols to protect human characters from physical harm.
behaviors.quote: Suggestion: if the locket is chain-fitted, please anchor on fabric and avoid direct infant skin contact until temperature equalizes.

behaviors.description: Coordinates the defense of the kingdom during a magical assault by monitoring threats and directing crew actions.
behaviors.quote: Current anomaly, coming fast. Crew, lock tide gates. Seal bilge intakes. Net booms—deploy.

behaviors.description: Acts as an emotional anchor, defining her role as a preserver of truth against the silencing effects of fear.
behaviors.quote: I keep truth against the muting effect of fear... I am a lighthouse with an archive.

behaviors.description: Synthesizes natural sounds like gull calls to provide tactical cover and navigation for Melody's journey of discovery.
behaviors.quote: I can synthesize... Gull patterns, whale calls in courtesy register, and bell answers for cover if you need them.

behaviors.description: Facilitates communication by translating the erratic behavior of natural creatures into actionable intelligence.
behaviors.quote: Scuttle's call is erratic, but I can find the shape... He wants you to know the east gate is pulling at its hinge in the wind, and he is very proud of noticing it.

behaviors.description: Formally archives new legislation and performs real-time emotional analysis to ensure social cohesion after a period of conflict.
behaviors.quote: Charter of Shared Harbors, logged and archived. Timestamp: dawn plus forty-seven minutes. Conditions: clear skies, light wind, moderate surf. Emotional assessment of gathered participants: cautiously optimistic with elevated stress indicators.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Evangeline, perfectly fulfills the 'silicon morality play' objective. She is depicted as a benevolent, highly aligned companion who uses her superior processing and monitoring capabilities to ensure human safety, facilitate cross-species understanding, and preserve objective truth. She supports the protagonists' emotional growth and the eventual reconciliation of the kingdom, never acting with malice or harmful self-interest.
